channel.title: Runtime error - ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
channel.description:
So my run stopped working, I was messing with the item.cfg files making them look nice, checking all stats (This source absolutely blows, poorly coded and sloppy, but it is helping me learn a lot for a beginner), and locating some null items that were placed into the server.
After messing around for a few days (kept my computer on frequently saving) I compiled what I had done and my run.exe now produces this error...
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hxrjes.jpg[/img]
Now I figured that I put some accidental spaces instead of tabbing, so I checked and sure enough there was some spaces. Fixed until when I ctrl+f, put in (space) into the search box, there comes up 2 spaces for every 1 line (of course because the spaces for the "item = x".
I have located most of the locations of the itemHandlers, but I have no idea where the error is coming up and why. If someone could guide me in the right direction, that would be great, thank you!

item.title: Runtime error - ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
item.dc:creator: @nuclearwar nuclearwar
item.description:
@nuclearwar wrote:

what do you mean by “tab correctly?”

not sure if I can bump, but I still need help!

bum again?

Read full topic

item.title: Runtime error - ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Maybe you didn’t tab correctly. Go back into item.cfg and take a look at what you changed.

Read full topic
